title: Inactivity Notification
body:
Hi ! 
I am Diamond 5 in solo/duo rank. RIght now I have the ''Inactivity Notification'' and it says that I'm going to be demoted in 2 days, but I can't solo/duo queue because It's not there. Can someone help me? 
By the way I don't have the best english hahaha :)
Thank you.

replies.body: This notification is just a visual thing, and doesn't actually do anything.  It's the preseason, so there is absolutely no decay or inactivity.  This is also detailed in our [Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ) for more details.  Hope that helps bring some ease as well clear things up!
